rationale: The segment states factual information about illness and lack of testing, not a capability or preparedness measure.
statement_text: Earlier it was revealed that a household contact of the individual [H5N1 patient] became ill on the same day as the person who was hospitalized. Earlier it was revealed that a household contact of the individual became ill on the same day as the person who was hospitalized. But that second person [household contact] was not tested while he or she was ill.
